original_title: У горы, на горе, с горы
overview: The Idiot and the Cat live in utter jazz ugliness. The idiot is busy with his own affairs, trying to learn French, and at the same second he throws everything and runs to play the double bass, and the Cat cuts papers all the time. The unexpected new hobby of the Idiot draws the characters into an equally jazzy journey into another world and into a different mood.
title: At the Mountain, On the Mountain, From the Mountain
